title: ふわふわ、キラキラ、あこがれは

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Four hundred ninety-nine,
five hundred... ugh!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haaah~! I give up~!
...Aww, I can't do anymore~.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: No, being able to do that many in a row is plenty amazing...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No, no—
I'm sure everyone can do about this much.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew, I need to train more...!
It was past mid-October, and the days of rigorous training for the 'Japan Cup' continued.

Then one day.
A letter arrived for Matikanetannhauser from the round-glasses reporter who had interviewed her before.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Round-glasses...? Oh, I remember!
We talked during the 'Diamond S'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I'm happy!
I wonder what it is?
It seemed to be personal content, not related to an interview, so I handed it over unopened.
Matikanetannhauser opened the letter with a relaxed expression, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm hmm, yeah yeah...
............

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Pa!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wha, wha wha wha, whaa...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Ju, ju ju ju just a sec!
I'm going for a little walk!
Worried by her suspicious behavior of leaving without waiting for a reply, I secretly followed her and—
She was on a nearby hill. For some reason, she was keeping her distance from the letter.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Trainer...!?
Huh, why!?
choice_data_list: I got worried. What in the world happened?
I got worried. What in the world happened?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, well, that's, uhh~...
Matikanetannhauser hesitated, then spoke quietly.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: My journey to find myself... has come to an end.
Without really understanding, I looked at the letter handed to me—it was a long letter of gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'Actually, since then, I've been transferred to a different department, and now I'm in charge of an area completely unrelated to the Umamusume world.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'At first, it was painful to leave the department I had carved out for myself and found meaning in.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'But seeing you work hard in your races pushed me forward again and helped me stay positive.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'To you, who have given me courage time and again, I selfishly decided to send this thank-you letter once more.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'It might be rude to say this, but...'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'I think it's precisely because you weren't special that your forward-looking attitude resonated with me.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'If you were a distant existence... overflowing with talent, just dazzlingly strong,'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'your words probably wouldn't have resonated.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'Matikanetannhauser-san, you're often called a 'supporting character' because of your ordinariness, but—'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'to me, it's precisely because you're 'ordinary' that you're the one and only 'protagonist.'

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: 'From now on, even if it's from a bit of a distance, I'll be cheering you on.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I thought being a 'protagonist' was something special.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I thought it was someone sparkling, strong, with a powerful presence that makes everyone want to follow their lead.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's why I never understood what the Chairman meant when she said, 'Because it's you.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But now, finally... I get it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Being a 'protagonist' isn't just for the special...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because I'm ordinary and plain, there were people who could push me forward...!
At the somewhat forceful word 'protagonist,' I suddenly remember how Matikanetannhauser back then had such a dazzling expression on her face.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rice-san is Bourbon-san's hero...? Or rather, what is it?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A presence that sparkles in the very center of your heart and gives you courage and the strength to move forward—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Protagonist.'
I remember how that usually flat Matikanetannhauser was unusually excited, both before and after races.
choice_data_list: ...Do you want to become more of a 'protagonist'?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh.
In reality, over these two years, there have been many Umamusume who became more positive thanks to Matikanetannhauser's words.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: M-more!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I can—
choice_data_list: That letter is the best proof
That letter is the best proof

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser carefully smoothed out the slightly wrinkled edge of the letter.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I see.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Actually, you know...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I've really lived my whole life being 'ordinary.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I haven't really thought much about wanting to be strong like Rice-san or Bourbon-san, or wanting to become this or that.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If I had to say, it was just wanting to win races, win and see everyone's smiles, that's about it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But—well...
Matikanetannhauser looked up into the air as if searching for words.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Being a 'Protagonist' might be different, maybe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That day, Bourbon-san's face when she got her energy back has been stuck in my heart all this time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And you know, looking back now, I think the feeling I had back then was 'envy'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Envy. I want to become someone who can empower others that strongly too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...No, that's not all.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I might be able to do it too. For some reason, I started thinking that...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That thought stuck with me, and it just wouldn't go away. So—
A long silence falls—and then.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmph!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll do it! I'll give it a try!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Starting with the next 'Japan Cup'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I want to have the kind of power that Rice-san had that day, cheering on Bourbon-san—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The power of a 'protagonist' that moves someone's heart! I want to give that to someone again!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I want to become the 'protagonist'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ouch!? Ugh, ...something got in my eye...
The ending was a bit anticlimactic, but... anyway, from that day on, something inside her changed a little, but definitely.
A few days later, the Umamusume running in the 'Japan Cup' gathered for a press conference.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser-san, please share your enthusiasm for the 'Japan Cup'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I've always been a supporting character until now. I thought that was fine, and that winning was what mattered. But!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Circumstances have changed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: In the next 'Japan Cup', I'll show you that I can be the 'protagonist'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And I'll deliver the greatest race that can give courage to ordinary girls like me!
Matikanetannhauser's words slowly spread throughout the world—

text_block_list.name: Woman A
text_block_list.text: Maybe I'll go see the 'Japan Cup.' I hear Machitan is really fired up.

text_block_list.name: Woman B
text_block_list.text: Oh, I like Machitan too. It's amazing how she seems so ordinary, yet she's so forward-looking and hardworking.

text_block_list.name: Woman B
text_block_list.text: It makes me think that even an ordinary person like me could become like Machitan if I really put my heart into it.
Expectations for the 'Japan Cup' gradually grew higher.
